Thing.description: Contains services required for working with the GitBackup things, but which don't make sense to be present at the Git thing level.
Thing.name: GIT.Utility.Thing

FieldDefinition.description: prefix used for exporting Localization Tokens
FieldDefinition.name: LocalizationTokensPrefix

ServiceDefinition.description: Deletes a GitBackup Thing involves two operations: 1. Deleting the Thing itself and 2. Deleting the FileRepository subfolder that stored that Git repository.
ServiceDefinition.name: DeteleGitThing

ServiceDefinition.description: This service gets the list of the Git Things in the System, plus one additional Mashup for the plus sign
ServiceDefinition.name: GetGitHeaderTabs

ServiceDefinition.description: This will import an entity in the system.
ServiceDefinition.name: ImportEntity

ServiceDefinition.description: Adds UserExtension Properties needed by the GitBackupExtension
ServiceDefinition.name: InitUserExtensionProperties

ServiceDefinition.description: Removes entities from the export entity list
ServiceDefinition.name: RemoveEntitiesFromExportList
